sentences.sContent: Sian: Exactly, this term is a combination of 'cyber' — relating to computers — and hypochondriac.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sian: Exactly, this term is a combination of 'cyber' — relating to computers — and hypochondriac.
sentences.sCn: 希安： 没错，这个词是与电脑有关的“网络”和“疑病症患者”这两个词的结合。 我们来听几个例句。

words.tran: 过分担心自己健康的；忧郁症的

trans.tranOther: someone who always worries about their health and thinks they may be ill, even when they are really not ill
